SCRIPT.MSCRI:
! Define action specific java options and values : SET &ACTION_NAME# = "PutFileAction"
! Build java arguments : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V7.PUB.INCLUDE.SSH_PREPARE_CMD@UNIX
: SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# =&UC4RB_FILE_PATH# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V7.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#, " -sourcepath &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
: SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# =&UC4RB_OUTPUT_LOG# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V7.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#, " -outfile &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
: SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#, " -tempdir tempdir-&$RUNID#") : SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#, " -command &UC4RB_EXE_FILE_CMD#") : SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#, " -flg &FLAG#")
: PRINT &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# ! Invoking java binar &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#
